title: Whack-A-Mole
description: Get ready for an exciting game of skill and speed with Whack-a-Mole! This classic arcade game has been brought to life using the power of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, and it's ready to challenge your reflexes and precision.

title: Pair-Quest
description: Challenge your memory with our React-based game! Match cards, beat the clock, and enjoy stunning visuals. Get ready for a brain-teasing adventure!

title: Virtual-Volley
description: Enjoy classic Ping Pong fun! Built with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, it offers thrilling matches against the computer or a friend. Ready to test your skills?

title: Wordle-Guess
description: Welcome to Wordle, a captivating word-guessing game that challenges your vocabulary and deduction skills. In this classic word puzzle brought to life with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, your objective is to decipher a concealed five-letter word.

title: Create-Circle
description: Create colorful circles with a click! Our game, built using vanilla JavaScript and HTML, lets you unleash your artistic side. Explore a world of vibrant patterns effortlessly.

title: Dino-Jumping
description: Enjoy endless fun with our vanilla JavaScript jumping game. Test your reflexes as you navigate obstacles and platforms, collecting power-ups along the way. How high can you score? Play now!

title: Real-Time-Tick-Toe
description: Play real-time Tick-Tac-Toe with friends and foes! Built with React, Socket.io, and Express, this game elevates the classic experience. Challenge opponents, strategize, and claim victory. Get ready to redefine Xs and Os!
